about_the_game:
The time has come to take your revenge.

Take on the role of "The Summoner", a mysterious character whose purpose is to perform a ritual to summon the goddess Ilur and take revenge on the people who stole everything from you.
Gain power by drawing the various arcane runes at your disposal. The further the ritual progresses, the more powerful the runes will become.

But keep in mind that your actions will not go unnoticed by the wary eyes of the villagers. Once they realise your intentions, they will not stop until they finish you off. Use everything in your power to take them down!

The ritual

Must

Continue.

Characteristics:


Draw arcane runes yourself: Connect the dots correctly to gain power, which you can spend on upgrades or recharging your defences.

Defend yourself against your enemies: Townies will come relentlessly in waves. Be ready to receive them as they deserve. Use the power you gain to generate different defence mechanisms: Gargoyle heads or summoning.

short_description: Ritual is a tower defense that deals with a sorcerer who must draw runes to invoke a goddess of death. During the summoning, villagers and believers will try to overthrow you. To achieve your goal, you must acquire improvements that enhance your rituals, or the defense of your fortress.
